headline: Applied Materials buys 9% stake in chip equipment supplier BESI
summary: Investing.com -- Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) has acquired a 9% stake in BE Semiconductor Industries (AS:BESI), becoming the Dutch chip equipment maker’s largest shareholder, according to a filing on Monday.
